title: NeuralGirls
description:
NeuralGirls is a cryptoart experiment with the mission to change the narrative in relation to women and STEM disciplines. 30% of the sales are donated to different organizations focused on empowerment of women.

ERC-721 Non Fungible Token

**0.406 ETH Donated**

post.title: Neuropharmacologist
post.body:
![Neuropharmacologist](img/Neuropharmacologist_nipples_off_lowres.jpg)

Neuropharmacology is the study of how drugs affect cellular function in the nervous system, and the neural mechanisms through which they influence behavior.

Generative digital artwork by NeuralGirls, includes print version up to 104x138cm (nipples on frame) and 125x93cm (nipples out of frame) at 300dpi.

On sale: https://opensea.io/assets/0x618f734511c5f85e4eaac674f35756d8cfdd3a2b/4

post.title: Astroparticle Physicist
post.body:
![Astroparticle Physicist - NeuralGirls](img/AstroparticlePhysicist_nipples_no_lowres.jpg)

Astroparticle physics, also called particle astrophysics, is a branch of particle physics that studies elementary particles of astronomical origin and their relation to astrophysics and cosmology. It is a relatively new field of research emerging at the intersection of particle physics, astronomy, astrophysics, detector physics, relativity, solid state physics, and cosmology.

Generative digital artwork by NeuralGirls, includes print version up to 104x138cm (nipples on frame) and 118x89cm (nipples out of frame) at 300dpi.

More info: [https://opensea.io/assets/0x618f734511c5f85e4eaac674f35756d8cfdd3a2b/1](https://opensea.io/assets/0x618f734511c5f85e4eaac674f35756d8cfdd3a2b/1)

post.title: About NeuralGirls
post.body:
We're not the girls you want us to be NeuralGirls is a cryptoart experiment with the mission to change the narrative in relation to **women** and **STEM** disciplines. We want to have a very real impact on the world, which is why we are partnering with different Women in STEM organizations around the globe. We will donate 30% of the income from the auction to these organizations. The proposal is simple, under the lema “we’re not the girls you want us to be” create paintings of confident women and select titles resembling technical abilities and important positions like Astrochemist, Film Director, Volcanologist or Mathematician. Blockchain technology provides you a unique opportunity to include art to your investment portfolio. We only generate one copy (token) for each piece of art, each one is completely unique. https://opensea.io/category/neuralgirls Our NEURALGIRLS (NRGS) smart contract was created using open frameworks.
## High resolution. Ready to print to canvas. You will obtain a fine art highly valuable Cryptocollectible, including an ultra high resolution version ready to print into canvas. Each work of art includes both SFW (without nudity) and NSFW (with nudity) versions to print. You can choose the one that fits your interest.
## Yours forever. Yours everywhere. The work of art is stored on the Blockchain and IPFS for eternity, and even when digital copies of the image can be created, you and only you will hold the authentic NeuralGirl.
## Proof of ownership. Art Provenance. Your Ethereum wallet **is** your Certificate of Authenticity. **Make sure to backup and keep it safe.** As in the material world it will allow you to re sell the artwork.
